mapper.insert: insert into duty (sys_duty_id, suty_road, sys_section_id, sys_road_id, fenguanstaff_id, totalstaff_id, onestaff_id, twostaff_id) values (#{sysDutyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sutyRoad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysSectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fenguanstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onestaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twostaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update duty
suty_road = #{sutyRoad,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_section_id = #{sysSectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sys_road_id = #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fenguanstaff_id = #{fenguanstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalstaff_id = #{totalstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onestaff_id = #{onestaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
twostaff_id = #{twostaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sys_duty_id = #{sysDutyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update duty set suty_road = #{sutyRoad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_section_id = #{sysSectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_road_id = #{sysRoadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fenguanstaff_id = #{fenguanstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalstaff_id = #{totalstaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, onestaff_id = #{onestaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, twostaff_id = #{twostaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sys_duty_id = #{sysDutyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT *,s.section_name,r.road_name FROM duty d,section s, road r WHERE d.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id AND d.sys_road_id = r.sys_road_id

SELECT * FROM duty d,section s, road r
d.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id AND d.sys_road_id = r.sys_road_id
and concat(suty_road,section_name,road_name) like concat(concat('%',#{sutyRoad}),'%')
and section_name like concat(concat('%',#{sectionName}),'%')
